title: Love Don't Die
lyrics: - - If I know one thing, that's true It ain't what you say, it's what you do And you don't say much, yeah, that's true But I listen when you do A thousand years go by But love don't die If I know one thing, that's true It's that I'm never leaving you And you don't say much, yeah, that's true But I lose it when you do Don't let them tell no lie Love don't Die No matter where we go Or even if we don't And even if they try They'll never take my body from your side Love don't die If there is one thing, that's true It's not what I say, it's what I do And I say too much, yeah, that's true So just listen to what I do A thousand years go by Mmmm But love don't Die No matter where we go Or even if we don't And even if they try They'll never take my body from your side Love don't die She can break it up Shake your money down You can box it in Bury it in the ground You can close it off and turn it away Try to keep it down, six feet in the ground Die No matter where we go Or even if we don't And even if they try They'll never take my body from your side Love don't Die No matter where we go Or even if we don't And even if they try They'll never take my body from your side Love don't  die
